Q: How does retrieval policy 1 mitigate stale context?
A: It applies source freshness scoring, lineage-aware deduplication, and score-calibrated merging before final ranking. Reference profile 1 also enables stable pagination checkpoints.

A: It applies source freshness scoring, lineage-aware deduplication, and score-calibrated merging before final ranking. Reference profile 2 also enables stable pagination checkpoints.
